entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:44 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -3.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 8:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 3 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h gust 32 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
